entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then clearing. Snow level 1400 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 early this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
